about_the_game:
You are our very best in these chaotic times. Your job is to help out the locals during these devastating disasters. Can you survive the calamities?

  • Chaotic Events: Experience meteors smashing into buildings, physics driven tornadoes ripping through towns and tossing you and the locals around, and exploding everything near by, survive the blistering cold inflicted by blizzards, and find cover while dust storms are hitting and huge tumbleweeds hit the town.

  • Destruction: Experience buildings getting ripped apart by tornadoes or meteors smashing into buildings flying debris.


  • Player Choices: Play with your friends or find others to help out the locals while trying to survive natural disasters. Adapt and alter your surroundings to gain advantages and create new paths to safety.

  • Fun Objectives: Enjoy doing casual objectives to help out the town like evacuating citizens, repairing defenses for the town, defending the town, and gathering rare exotic resources for research!

  • Funny Mechanics: Enjoy humorous elements like ragdoll physics, grappling guns, and other quirky mechanics that add fun to the chaos. Ability to grab objects and place them wherever you want. You can throw things, and calamities are bound to throw you and your friends around. You may even see the locals getting thrown across the town.

  • Threats: Encounter various threats, from robots to explosive hazards, that require strategic planning and quick reflexes to overcome.

  • Basic Economy: Manage in-game currency, trade items, and gather resources to help rebuild and survive.

name: Calamity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: Calamity is about epic storms causing absolute mayhem. Help those on the town, fight off killer robots, and escape the storms in this fast-paced, multiplayer action-adventure.
